dbms.bplus
Class InnerNode

java.lang.Object
  dbms.bplus.Node
      dbms.bplus.InnerNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InnerNode
extends Node
implements java.io.Serializable

This class implements the inner node of a B+ tree.

See Also:

Constant Field Values

keys

private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Integer> keys
Contains the keys of the each time inner node.

children

private java.util.LinkedList<Node> children
Contains the children nodes of the each time Inner Node.

bucketFactor

private final int bucketFactor
The value of the bucket factor for the each time B+ Tree. We need this in order to know the minimum and maximum keys and chilren we are allowed to have to our inner nodes.
